message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique item that will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, my budget allows me to pay up to $12000 for the product. I would like to make a counteroffer at this price.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was hoping to get a bit closer to the value I have in mind. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer the product to you for $13500.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I am still committed to finding a price that works within my budget. I would like to counteroffer at $13000 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. However, I still need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you at $13250, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to move forward with a counteroffer of $13000 for the product.
